name: Country Slimes
description:
THE GAME

Country Slimes is a stylized first-person adventure game where the main objective is to protect the village for as many days as possible.

The player was responsible for taking care of the village. Every night an attack of corrupted slimes occurs. To protect the central house the player needs to take care of wild slimes. Not taking care of wild slimes they become corrupt slimes and the more slimes the greater the difficulty.

The game is in alpha state and is available for download for all players who want to try it out. If you liked the project, please support by donating to the download!

Did you find any bugs or errors? Feel free to comment below. 

GAME CONTROLS

  • W A S D to move
  • Left mouse button to Attack
  • E to interact
  • F to grab Slime
  • 1 to select Sword
  • 2 to select the bow
